content.title: Start with the customer experience and work backwards to the technology
content.author: Steve Jobs
content.quote_text: You've gotta start with the customer experience and work backwards to the technology.

generation.prompt: Fortiche Arcane style dramatic close-ups with dynamic camera angles, high contrast lighting creating sharp shadows and bright highlights, mixed media technique with smooth character focus against painterly textured backgrounds, vertical emphasis with cinematic crop ratios.
